html:
8.8.20  1:34 pm   do you answer questions that have been asked before?

      i have never been asked a question that has been asked before

8.8.20  1:15 pm   Are you the person who made songs then stopped making them for a year? 

      you should see the lengths of time i've stopped making them before. and then you should see how many it caused me to make after that

8.8.20  12:45 pm   what's your purpose in life?

      maybe something like this

8.8.20  12:38 pm   do you like music?

      i'm starting to warm up to it

8.8.20  12:32 pm   why are chocolate chips called chocolate chips?

      because they are like little chips of chocolate. hopefully you get what i'm saying

8.8.20  11:22 am   whatcha working on

      songwriting

8.8.20  10:56 am   what you do when you at your darkest hour?

      embark on a fairly ambitious upload schedule

8.8.20  10:29 am   what about reinventing the graphics department do you feel has been potentially unsuccessful?

      it's been many months and still there is arguably no functioning graphics department

8.8.20  9:33 am   How to make a song that is the style of yours?

      i just make any song i can

8.8.20  9:22 am   what project are you working on?

      making songs and videos for the rest of my life

8.8.20  8:30 am   Do you still use Final Cut?

      no, but probably the one you are referring to i never used

8.8.20  7:54 am   what would you call a serious question?

      'what the heck'

8.8.20  7:12 am   What's your dream job?

      making sense

8.8.20  7:12 am   This really is a long long long way journey isn't it?

      yes

8.8.20  7:02 am   how can i spend 10 days while i wait for my amazon package to get here

      keep checking the estimation because it's probably gonna get there earlier, and if you miss it it might get destroyed in the rain

8.8.20  6:59 am   WHAT IS YOUR AGENDA!

      the second priority is try to do everything, but the first priority is try to find some sort of middle ground between everything and NOTHING which is definitely not on the agenda, but will happen if i don't find that middle ground

8.8.20  6:51 am   in this question "8.6.20  8:01 am    What's your best tip to get better at music?
      that happens automatically as long as you are having a good time" you said that as long as you have fun you will get better. does that mean that i could be doing good if i was not taught by a school?

      of course. in fact school is often what can cause people to not have a good time. at least based on the stories i've heard

8.8.20  5:52 am   are you making a new video?

      almost

8.8.20  4:53 am   can you tell me a story please??

      sure

8.8.20  4:26 am   got any party ideas?

      see if you can have 2 parties at the same time

8.8.20  3:55 am   do you feel like changing your mind?

      yes

8.8.20  3:46 am   can i get the validation my parents never gave me

      sure

8.8.20  3:21 am   Is there a possibility that all of us aren't humans but actually human shaped trout

      no

8.8.20  3:11 am   have you ever licked a pinecone?

      no but it's on my to do list

8.8.20  3:01 am   When are you gonna release this big project

      what project

8.8.20  2:33 am   what should i do about my predicament?

      make it into a folk tale

8.8.20  2:24 am   Why are birds made of trees?

      if 'made of' means 'in the'. which in some cultures i'm sure it does

8.8.20  1:30 am   do capital letters exist?

      i have no idea

8.8.20  1:19 am   Is it truly possible to frolic too hard?

      YES

8.8.20  1:03 am   i never see you use periods much, is there a reason behind this

      hold on just a minute. i use them more than you, so i think it is you who should explain first

8.8.20  1:01 am   Have you ever carried a dozen bricks down a brick road through a brick door and into a brick house?

      no but that sounds like something i would do

8.8.20  12:56 am   Who is your favorite creator? 

      could be you

8.8.20  12:36 am   do you know how awesome your music is?

      i'm doing some experiments to hopefully find out

8.8.20  12:32 am   What do you like about history?

      how true it is

8.7.20  11:19 pm   you say in a note that you're trying to make it to the south pole by nightfall. did you?

      i must have, because that video got finished and produced

8.7.20  11:05 pm   i heard somewhere you're pursuing 3D animation in school. is this true? 

      the school part is definitely not true. the 3D part has been true until recently when i took a hard left turn, similar to the turns i've done at various times before

8.7.20  10:59 pm   Do you believe in ghosts?

      everything is ghosts

8.7.20  10:47 pm   hey bill, i like your music- i've studied music before for some time but i don't know how to write stuff- i don't get musical ideas coming into my head. if i sit down at an instrument i just play stuff i already know- how do i make a song that didn't exist before?

      a good way to open the door is to try to come up with something that is definitely NOT a song. then, the music will get angry and get revenge on you by throwing songs at you

8.7.20  10:34 pm   How weird is too weird when it comes to time signatures?

      maybe something less than zero

8.7.20  9:27 pm   What's a good ratio of seriousness to non seriousness for a song 

      it's good if you can fuse them together entirely, to make a totally new element

8.7.20  9:10 pm   when is the funny

      no such thing

8.7.20  9:00 pm   Are you a human 

      oh that would explain a lot

8.7.20  8:43 pm   In one of your beautiful videos, you explain that you wrote a letter to yourself and then opened it. This was a very good video. However I must ask you one question; what did the letter say?

     it says, in the next video released the day after

     So many people are curious.

     that must be because they are watching it somewhere where the videos are not displayed in order

      Of course, you don't have to answer. If I forced you to, that would just be mean.

     i answered it the next day. actually i answered it the same day, because those videos were written at the same time

     You deserve privacy. Thanks!

8.7.20  8:37 pm   if you could pick one object or thing that represents your true inner self, what would it be and why?

      planet earth

8.7.20  8:10 pm   how do i establish my own music genre?

      in reality, this will happen automatically. but society will never stop trying to make it part of someone else's genre

8.7.20  7:55 pm   do you usually wait for inspiration or do you try to make it happen somehow?

      sometimes i try to use reverse psychology

8.7.20  7:21 pm   What was the school that "might quit" refers to?

      any

8.7.20  6:43 pm   will you ever start making more videos again? 

      of course

8.7.20  6:20 pm   is everything okay?

      it seems like it could be

8.7.20  5:51 pm   I'm trying to diversify as a musician, and I saw somewhere that you said that we should approach music theory cautiously, and not over think things - like, work the theory around the music instead of vice-versa. I feel like I've learned too much theory and now I've like ruined my chance of just throwing that stuff down the drain. Suggestions?

      as long as you follow what you enjoy, i think you're gonna be fine
